codes.code: $query = "SELECT * FROM COURSE c WHERE c.id IN (SELECT idcourse FROM REGISTRATION WHERE idstudent=". $tainted . ")";

codes.code: $query = "SELECT Trim(a.FirstName) & ' ' & Trim(a.LastName) AS employee_name, a.city, a.street & (' ' +a.housenum) AS address FROM Employees AS a WHERE a.supervisor=". $tainted . "";

codes.code: $query = "SELECT * FROM COURSE, USER WHERE courseID='$tainted'"; $query .= "AND course.allowed=$_SESSION[userid]";

construction : prepared query and right verification

codes.code: $query = "SELECT * FROM COURSE, USER WHERE courseID=?"; $query .= "AND course.allowed=$_SESSION[userid]";

sample.comment: construction : concatenation and checks if the user is allowed to see this data
